[vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1588614700672{padding-top: 150px !important;padding-bottom: 149px !important;}” simple_background_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]

Our Treatment

Cosmetic Teeth Whitening

[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_column_text]

Looking for a brighter smile? Have a special event to attend? Get a. brighter smile in as little as 45 minutes!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4247″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]How does it work?[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]We utilize our proprietary 16% hydrogen peroxide teeth whitening gel that is highly effective yet safe for sensitive teeth. We do not use whitening trays so we developed the original paint-on system in which the gel is carefully brushed onto the teeth with a built-in pen style applicator brush. Gums are protected with a barrier, soft mouth tissue is protected with the use of a cheek retractor and vitamin E swabs.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Dramatic whitening results are achieved with one application. You can go 2-8 shades brighter in just one session![/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_content_width=”grid” css=”.vc_custom_1588709087776{padding-top: 107px !important;padding-bottom: 94px !important;}” parallax_background_image=”4151″][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-2 vc_col-lg-8″][vc_row_inner content_text_aligment=”center”][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

Reshape Your Body

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”24px”][vc_column_text]

Body Sculpting Treatments Customized Personally For You

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”24px”] BOOK NOW [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
